topics.body:
A bit of random life stuff:
Wow; I was really hairy.

So for the past *6 months* I've been using hair removal stuff to get rid of my body hair and it's finally stopping growing.  Normally it takes people like 2 months if they want to use body hair removal creams or lazers.  How hairy was I?  I would literally bleed from shaving cause my hair follicles were so thick that the razer regardless of how good it was would tear up my skin.

You know how hairy Squiggy is?  Imagine triple that.
